title: I’ll also be serious!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Yoshiko-san, I’m sorry…. I heard about it from Setsuna-san and Ayumu-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh, about what? Also it’s Yohane, alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Umm, it seems that they might have troubled you by mixing novels and reality, or so they said….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>….It doesn’t really bother me though?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Fufufu. It was a long time ago when Yohane was being chased by angels…. I just thought “Why would they bring that up now”, you know? The angels that knew of Yohane’s power have all run back to heaven!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>(A- amazing….! The way she sticks to her character no matter the situation…. I have to learn from her, or else I can’t be called a great actress!)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kukuku…. Have all run back, you said?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh? What is it, so suddenly….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You’re way too arrogant, Fallen Angel - Yohane! Now, I shall show you the power of angels!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wait! I’m telling you that what I’m saying isn’t just a play or anything like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
